title: Task 1: Describe form, style, materials, technique, or content.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe one visual characteristic of the sculpture
Response accurately describes one visual characteristic of the sculpture
Response accurately describes two visual characteristics of the sculpture

title: Task 2: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, or content shape the work.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately use one example of specific visual evidence to explain how the artist represents the concept of idealism in this work
Response accurately uses one example of specific visual evidence to explain how the artist represents the concept of idealism in this work
Response accurately uses two examples of specific visual evidence to explain how the artist represents the concept of idealism in this work

title: Task 3: Explain why the work demonstrates continuity or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately explain why this focus on idealism is typical for Neoclassical sculpture.
Response does accurately explain why this focus on idealism is typical for Neoclassical sculpture.
